#summary Console command get
#labels console

= Get =

Return the value of the requested property

== Syntax ==

{{{get <property-name>}}}

Where:

 * property-name  Name of the property

== Example ==

{{{
> get limit

limit = 20
}}}

== See also ==

To know all the properties setted use the [ConsoleCommandProperties properties].

This is a command of the Orient console. To know all the commands go to [ConsoleCommands Console commands].
